subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: If show courts could talk, the old Court 2 at the All England Club would have plenty of tales of upsets to share with the new Graveyard court at Wimbledon.
snippet: If show courts could talk, the old Court 2 at the All England Club would have plenty of tales of upsets to share with the new Graveyard court at Wimbledon.
